meanings.sent3: The detective's curacy in solving mysteries was unmatched in the city.
meanings.sent4: His curacy in hitting the target with every shot made him a sharpshooter.
meanings.sent5: The artist's curacy in capturing emotions on canvas was truly remarkable.
